title: Say So | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: Say So | Joel Osteen
description:
Your words have creative power. It's one thing to believe you're blessed, but when you declare, "I'm blessed," it takes on a whole new meaning. If you want to rise to the next level, send your words in the direction you want your life to go.



Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
